name: Wei Hsiang
story: Song grew up in a rural village in China where he learned the value of hard work and discipline. He joined the military straight out of high school and has proven himself to be a valuable asset to his unit. Despite the challenges of being away from his family, he remains loyal to his country and his comrades. His skills as a grenadier have earned him the respect of his superiors and the trust of his fellow soldiers. While he is reserved and quiet, those who know him well appreciate his unwavering dedication and his ability to stay calm under pressure.
